verses.verse: Then Jonah <WH3124> prayed <WH6419> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> his God <WH430> out of the fish's <WH1710> belly, <WH4480> <WH4578>

And said, <WH559> I cried <WH7121> by reason of mine affliction <WH4480> <WH6869> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and he heard <WH6030> me; out of the belly <WH4480> <WH990> of hell <WH7585> cried <WH7768> I, and thou heardest <WH8085> my voice. <WH6963>

For thou hadst cast <WH7993> me into the deep, <WH4688> in the midst <WH3824> of the seas; <WH3220> and the floods <WH5104> compassed me about: <WH5437> all <WH3605> thy billows <WH4867> and thy waves <WH1530> passed <WH5674> over <WH5921> me.
Then I <WH589> said, <WH559> I am cast out <WH1644> of <WH4480> <WH5048> thy sight; <WH5869> yet <WH389> I will look <WH5027> again <WH3254> toward <WH413> thy holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>
The waters <WH4325> compassed me about, <WH661> even to <WH5704> the soul: <WH5315> the depth <WH8415> closed me round about, <WH5437> the weeds <WH5488> were wrapped <WH2280> about my head. <WH7218>

I went down <WH3381> to the bottoms <WH7095> of the mountains; <WH2022> the earth <WH776> with her bars <WH1280> was about <WH1157> me forever: <WH5769> yet hast thou brought up <WH5927> my life <WH2416> from corruption, <WH4480> <WH7845> O LORD <WH3068> my God. <WH430>

When my soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> within <WH5921> me I remembered <WH2142> <WH853> the LORD: <WH3068> and my prayer <WH8605> came in <WH935> unto <WH413> thee, into <WH413> thine holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>
They that observe <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892> forsake <WH5800> their own mercy. <WH2617>

But I <WH589> will sacrifice <WH2076> unto thee with the voice <WH6963> of thanksgiving; <WH8426> I will pay <WH7999> that that <WH834> I have vowed. <WH5087> Salvation <WH3444> is of the LORD. <WH3068>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto the fish, <WH1709> and it vomited out <WH6958> <WH853> Jonah <WH3124> upon <WH413> the dry <WH3004> land.
